verses.verse: Why standest <WH5975> <WH8799> thou afar off <WH7350>, O YY <WH3068>? why hidest <WH5956> <WH8686> thou thyself in times <WH6256> of trouble <WH6869> ?

The wicked <WH7563> in his pride <WH1346> doth persecute <WH1814> <WH8799> the poor <WH6041>: let them be taken <WH8610> <WH8735> in the devices <WH4209> that <WH2098> they have imagined <WH2803> <WH8804>.

For the wicked <WH7563> boasteth <WH1984> <WH8765> of his heart's <WH5315> desire <WH8378>, and blesseht <WH1288> <WH8765> the covetous <WH1214> <WH8802>, whom the YY <WH3068> abhorreth <WH5006> <WH8765>.
The wicked <WH7563>, through the pride <WH1363> of his countenance <WH639>, will not seek <WH1875> <WH8799> after 'Elohim: 'Elohim <WH430> is not in all his thoughts <WH4209>.

His ways <WH1870> are always <WH6256> grievous <WH2342> <WH8799>; thy judgments <WH4941> are far above <WH4791> out of his sight: as for all his enemies <WH6887> <WH8802>, he puffeth <WH6315> <WH8686> at them.
He hath said <WH559> <WH8804> in his heart <WH3820>, I shall not be moved <WH4131> <WH8735>: for I shall never <WH1755> <WH1755> be in adversity <WH7451>.
His mouth <WH6310> is full <WH4390> <WH8804> of cursing <WH423> and deceit <WH4820> and fraud <WH8496>: under his tongue <WH3956> is mischief <WH5999> and vanity <WH205>.

He sitteth <WH3427> <WH8799> in the lurking places <WH3993> of the villages <WH2691>: in the secret places <WH4565> doth he murder <WH2026> <WH8799> the innocent <WH5355>: his eyes <WH5869> are privily set <WH6845> <WH8799> against the poor <WH2489>.

He lieth in wait <WH693> <WH8799> secretly <WH4565> as a lion <WH738> in his den <WH5520>: he lieth in wait <WH693> <WH8799> to catch <WH2414> <WH8800> the poor <WH6041>: he doth catch <WH2414> <WH8799> the poor <WH6041>, when he draweth <WH4900> <WH8800> him into his net <WH7568>.
He croucheth <WH1794> <WH8799>, and humbleth <WH7817> <WH8799> himself, that the poor <WH2426> <WH8675> <WH2489> <WH8676> <WH2489> may fall <WH5307> <WH8804> by his strong ones <WH6099>.
He hath said <WH559> <WH8804> in his heart <WH3820>, 'Elohim <WH410> hath forgotten <WH7911> <WH8804>: he hideth <WH5641> <WH8689> his face <WH6440>; he will never <WH5331> see <WH7200> <WH8804> it.
Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>; O 'Elohim <WH410>, lift up <WH5375> <WH8798> thine hand <WH3027>: forget <WH7911> <WH8799> not the humble <WH6035> <WH8675> <WH6041>.
Wherefore doth the wicked <WH7563> contemn <WH5006> <WH8765> 'Elohim <WH430>? he hath said <WH559> <WH8804> in his heart <WH3820>, Thou wilt not require <WH1875> <WH8799> it.

Thou hast seen <WH7200> <WH8804> it; for thou beholdest <WH5027> <WH8686> mischief <WH5999> and spite <WH3708>, to requite <WH5414> <WH8800> it with thy hand <WH3027>: the poor <WH2489> committeth <WH5800> <WH8799> himself unto thee; thou art the helper <WH5826> <WH8802> of the fatherless <WH3490>.
Break <WH7665> <WH8798> thou the arm <WH2220> of the wicked <WH7563> and the evil <WH7451> man: seek out <WH1875> <WH8799> his wickedness <WH7562> till thou find <WH4672> <WH8799> none <WH1077>.
The YY <WH3068> is King <WH4428> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>: the heathen <WH1471> are perished <WH6> <WH8804> out of his land <WH776>.

YY <WH3068>, thou hast heard <WH8085> <WH8804> the desire <WH8378> of the humble <WH6035>: thou wilt prepare <WH3559> <WH8686> their heart <WH3820>, thou wilt cause thine ear <WH241> to hear <WH7181> <WH8686>:
To judge <WH8199> <WH8800> the fatherless <WH3490> and the oppressed <WH1790>, that the man <WH582> of the earth <WH776> may no more <WH3254> <WH8686> oppress <WH6206> <WH8800>.
